name: The Last Light (PeachTreeOath)
description:
Two Player cooperative 2D infinite runner. Ride from light wave to light wave to keep your ball of light alive. Player 1 travels from light wave to light wave, while Player 2 places the upcoming light waves.

INSTRUCTIONS:

1p (Top part of screen): WASD or gamepad face buttons to change colors to ride different lines

2p (Lower part of screen): Arrow keys or gamepad L/R to move cursor

Spacebar or gamepad A button to place lines
